parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application that you want to modify.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the application. The description can be up to 256 characters in length.

parameters.name: Email
parameters.description: The email address of the application owner.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description: The owner of the application. The value can be up to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: PhoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone number of the application owner.
